member.name: T:Diassoft.DataAccess.Dialect
member.summary: Represents the Dialect used to communicate with a database.

member.name: P:Diassoft.DataAccess.Dialect.ReservedWords
member.summary: The list of reserved words for the dialect

member.name: P:Diassoft.DataAccess.Dialect.FieldNameChar
member.summary: The Character to add before and after any field. Add two characters to consider the first for the beginning and the second for the end. Use it for databases where you add field names that follow this example: [myFieldName].

member.name: P:Diassoft.DataAccess.Dialect.FieldValueChar
member.summary: The Character to add before and after any text field. Use it to add " or ' before any text assignment. The default value is '.

member.name: P:Diassoft.DataAccess.Dialect.TableNameChar
member.summary: The Character to add before and after any table name. Add two characters to consider the first for the beginning and the second for the end. Use it for databases where you add table names that follow this example: [myTableName].

member.name: P:Diassoft.DataAccess.Dialect.DateFormat
member.summary: The default date format to be used by the dialect

member.name: P:Diassoft.DataAccess.Dialect.TimeFormat
member.summary: The default time format to be used by the dialect

member.name: P:Diassoft.DataAccess.Dialect.NumericFormat
member.summary: The default Numeric format to be used by the dialect

member.name: P:Diassoft.DataAccess.Dialect.DecimalFormat
member.summary: The default Decimal format to be used by the dialect

member.name: P:Diassoft.DataAccess.Dialect.DateTimeFormat
member.summary: The datetime format

member.name: P:Diassoft.DataAccess.Dialect.BeforeQueryStatements
member.summary: Any statement that might be executed right before running any query

member.name: P:Diassoft.DataAccess.Dialect.AfterQueryStatements
member.summary: Any statement that might be executed right after a query runs

member.name: P:Diassoft.DataAccess.Dialect.StatementEndCharacter
member.summary: The character to be appended at the end of any statement

member.summary: Validates the Table Object.
member.param: A containing the database table information
member.remarks: Tables may not have blank spaces inside the string, unless there is a valid table name character.

member.name: M:Diassoft.DataAccess.Dialect.FormatTable(Diassoft.DataAccess.DatabaseObjects.Table)
member.summary: Returns the default formatting for a table name.
member.param: An instance of a object to represent the database table
member.returns: The input table name prefixed and suffixed with the table character separator.

member.summary: Formats the table
member.param: An instance of a object to represent the database table
Output parameter where the formatted table will be stored
member.returns: A bool value to define whether the table formatting was successfull or not.

member.name: M:Diassoft.DataAccess.Dialect.FormatTable(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the default formatting for a table name.
member.param: The table name
The owner of the table (or library depending on the database type)
member.returns: The input table name prefixed and suffixed with the table character separator.

member.summary: Formats the table

The owner of the table (or library depending on the database type)
Output parameter where the formatted table will be stored
member.returns: A bool value to define whether the table formatting was successfull or not.

member.name: M:Diassoft.DataAccess.Dialect.FormatTable(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the default formatting for a table name and its alias.
member.param: The table name
The owner of the table (or library depending on the database type)
The table alias
member.returns: The input table name prefixed and suffixed with the table character separator, concatenated with the table alias preceeded by "T_".

member.name: M:Diassoft.DataAccess.Dialect.TryFormatTable(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Formats the table
member.param: The table name
The owner of the table (or library depending on the database type)
The table alias
Output parameter where the formatted table will be stored
member.returns: A bool value to define whether the table formatting was successfull or not.

member.name: M:Diassoft.DataAccess.Dialect.FormatStatement(System.String)
member.summary: Format the statement accordingly to the the dialect.
member.param: The statement to format
member.remarks: Formatting will append the queries on the and to the query, and append the to the end of each sentence. It will not format any data inside it. Use to Format the tables inside the statement.

member.name: M:Diassoft.DataAccess.Operations.InquiryDbOperation.RunReader
member.summary: Runs the Inquiry Statement and output results to a Data Reader using the default command behavior
member.remarks: Please note that when using DataReaders, the system will only allow one query to run at a time.

member.summary: Runs the Inquiry Statement and output results to a Data Reader
